name: pnp-list-formatting-events-format
title: Events Format
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates applying view formatting to an Events list to imitate the modern events webpart. The format is implemented using the Tiles view and there is a format included that only includes this portion to make customization easier ([events-format-tiles-only](./events-format-tiles-only.json)). The primary sample demonstrates using a single format to provide both a list and tile view as well as demonstrating implementing a custom hover card with default person hover cards as well.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
